structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST THE STATE AND PUBLIC JUSTICE

law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 336, effective January 1, 1975. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 2. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1232, 1233, 1234.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Escape of convict from penitentiary or custody -- Attempt -- Within penitentiary or aiding another -- Jurisdiction of courts.
